title: Messengers of peace.- [Rev. ed.]
creator_credit: United Nations Television and Al Fox
brief_description: This film looks at the philatelic aspects of United Nations’ stamps. The UN has a postal administration and used the mail routes of the world for its won unique international postage stamps. Some of the world’s leading artists prepare the designs which appear on the stamps.
